Package com.hotelapplication.backend

Class Reservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hotelapplication.backend.Reservation
  • public class Reservation
extends Object
    The Reservation class represents a single hotel reservation. It includes details such as the assigned user, room ID, hotel ID, start and end dates of the reservation, and total price. This class provides methods to manage and retrieve reservation details, calculate the stay duration, and print a receipt.
    Author:
    Ethan Mojahedi

        public long calculateDays​(LocalDate startDate,
                          LocalDate endDate)
        Calculates the duration of stay in days (inclusive).
        Parameters:
        startDate - The start date of the stay.
        endDate - The end date of the stay.
        Returns:
        The total number of days for the stay.

        public boolean isEqualTo​(Reservation otherReservation)
        Compares this reservation to another to check equality by reservation number.
        Parameters:
        otherReservation - The Reservation to compare against.
        Returns:
        true if reservation numbers are equal, false otherwise.
